name: Super Hero Students
description:
Overview

You are a student attending a superhero academy, and you need to look the best you can. Personalize your student’s appearance from the unique available styles and full color customization, and specialize your student with our stats system.  

Designers/Analyzers: Calvin Briscoe, Matthew Umana, Justin Wu, Megan Holden,  Tyler Grendel

Goal

The player’s goal is to customize their character and stats to their personal preference.

Gameplay

Interact with the arrows to switch between styles and then customize the color to your liking. Strategically invest your limited points into the stats to suit your playstyle.

Obstacles: Looking the best you can be 

Mechanics: Customize character, change colors, swap styles, choose stats

Art Style / Concept
